title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models in LangChain pipelines.

title: llama-index-integrations-llms-ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM integration for Ollama; plug local models into RAG and agent workflows.

title: Ollama Web UI
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI); markdown, code highlighting, model manager.

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home Assistant custom component exposing Ollama models as conversation agents.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate, refactor and chat with Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Lightweight React/Next.js chat interface for Ollama with TailwindCSS.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Streamlit app demonstrating RAG with Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions using Ollama models.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot forwarding user messages to a local Ollama instance and streaming responses.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with async, streaming and embeddings support.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a free local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: Ollama Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, tips and integrations around Ollama.

title: Ollama on Hacker News
summary: Discussion thread covering Ollama v0.1.38 release notes and community feedback.
